actions.committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to clarify effective date provisions retroactively applying benefits guarantees to certain pension plans.
short_title: Plan Termination Insurance Clarification Act of 1984

summary.text: Plan Termination Insurance Clarification Act of 1984 - Amends the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to provide an eligibility standard with respect to plan termination insurance for certain pension plans whose date of benefit cessation cannot be determined.

titles.title: Plan Termination Insurance Clarification Act of 1984
A bill to amend the Employee Retirement Income Security Act of 1974 to clarify effective date provisions retroactively applying benefits guarantees to certain pension plans.
